sentence.Network_en: The usual symptoms are dyspnea, and sometimes paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea.
sentence.Network_cn: 其常见症状是呼吸困难, 有时呈阵发性夜间呼吸困难.

sentence.Network_en: When the animals were roused, there was a paroxysmal cough with the back arched.
sentence.Network_cn: 动物们惊起时, 则有发作性咳嗽和拱背.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To discuss some emergent measures about disposing paroxysmal fire damp explosion.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨突发特大瓦斯爆炸的有效医疗应急措施.
